meanings.definition: Taking up much space; large in volume.
meanings.sent1: The elephant had a voluminous body that filled the entire room.
meanings.sent2: The library had a voluminous collection of books on its shelves.
meanings.sent3: The voluminous cake was so big that it took three people to carry it.
meanings.sent4: Her voluminous laughter echoed through the empty hallways.
meanings.sent5: The voluminous clouds blocked out the sun, casting a shadow over the field.

meanings.definition: Having many pages or words; lengthy.
meanings.sent1: The student submitted a voluminous essay for the assignment.
meanings.sent2: The novel was so voluminous that it took weeks to finish reading.
meanings.sent3: The voluminous email from her friend made her smile with joy.
meanings.sent4: His voluminous speech at the event captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The voluminous dictionary on the shelf was a valuable resource for the students.

meanings.sent1: The report provided a voluminous amount of data for the research.
meanings.sent2: Her notes were so voluminous that she had to organize them into sections.
meanings.sent3: The voluminous textbook made studying for the exam easier.
meanings.sent4: The voluminous article in the magazine caught her attention immediately.
meanings.sent5: The voluminous map included all the landmarks in the city for tourists to explore.
